comments.author: nameMINE
comments.body: Hey guys, thanks for the replies sorry for the late response I was on holiday, so I'll be happy to provide photos and the listing of the house and everything in DMs I somehow feel uncomfortable to provide photos of the house and dox myself, so if anyone is seriously interested hit me up in DMs, the house absolutely requires renovation but I'm selling it at market value in the current condition as is. About the guy asking if you can actually buy stuff with crypto in Greece you absolutely can't that's why the buyer pays in crypto but the transaction will be made in cash as far the Greek government is concerned. As for people that ask for prove of ownership or something similar, the buyer will have to hire a Greek attorney to check the deeds and all the required paperwork I can assist with giving a few suggestions although google is your friend too. Buying a house in Greece is a rather bureaucratic process so the transaction won't happen without checks and all. So yeah if you're like seriously interested in buying a house in Greece with crypto, send me a dm and I'll be happy to send more info and everything
